com.clarionmedia.infinitum.reflection.impl

Class JavaClassReflector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.reflection.impl.JavaClassReflector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassReflector

    public class JavaClassReflector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassReflector

    Implementation of ClassReflector which uses Java's standard reflection API to introspect classes.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 03/15/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

        Description copied from interface: ClassReflector
        Retrieves a Class instance for the Class described by the given package-qualified name. Returns null if the Class can not be found.
        Specified by:
        getClass in interface ClassReflector
        Parameters:
        className - the package-qualified name of the desired Class
        Returns:
        instance of the Class or nullif the Class was not found

      • getSuperInterface

        public java.lang.Class<?> getSuperInterface(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                   java.lang.Class<?> interfaceType)
        Description copied from interface: ClassReflector
        Returns the first interface extending the given type in the class hierarchy for the given Class. If the Class itself is a qualifying interface, it will return itself.
        Specified by:
        getSuperInterface in interface ClassReflector
        Parameters:
        clazz - the Class to retrieve an interface for
        interfaceType - the interface type the interface to retrieve must be assignable from
        Returns:
        super interface or null if none exists
